phrases: It appeared as though humanity would be destroyed by the demons.
But a single mage saved them all.
He was called the Wizard King, and he became a legend.
The Eye of the Midnight Sun considers the Clover Kingdom their enemy.
Their goal is to defeat the Clover Kingdom and create their own independent nation.
They believe that once they gather all the magic stones,
they will transform into their true forms and inherit great power.
But in order for them to attain their true forms,
they need three more magic stones.
It was discovered that one of those stones lies in the Underwater Temple,
I am counting on you, Yami.
We were able to complete our mission yet again today.
I am sure our great Captain Vangeance will praise us.
Your spirit magic is indeed powerful.
But you need to stop fighting on your own.
Next time, do not ignore my orders and defeat all of the enemies instantly!
We will do things according to my plan!
Are you listening to me, Yuno?
I think it came from over there.
I wonder if there is an incident.
We are going to the ocean tomorrow.
Noelle does not have a swimsuit, so I was helping her pick one out.
I even told her she could borrow one of mine, but she does not want to.
How could I possibly wear that?
That is because Vanessa suddenly took off my clothes!
Well, it makes no sense to try on swimsuits while still wearing clothes.
It is your own fault for taking forever to undress.
I told you, there is no way I could wear that!
Picking out swimsuits to go to the beach?
Are you lot just fooling around instead of working again?
Want to come along, little boy?
We do not have any spare time on our hands, so I will pass.
I would love to go to the beach, but we also have another mission tomorrow.
I would have loved to see you in a swimsuit, Noelle.
I wonder what he will say if he sees me in my swimsuit...
I will send you pics later.
The Golden Dawn kids already left.
I guess you have already picked out your swimsuit.
Now we just need you to hurry up and pick one, Noelle.
I told you, I cannot wear that one!
Then how about this one over here?
It is a little expensive, though.
But... it does not seem to cover very much.
Also, what is all that flashy decoration for?
All eyes will be on you at the beach.
I wonder if Stupidsta will notice me.
Maybe he will at least compliment me if I wear this...
Like I care if he notices me or not!
What would you like to do?
I wanted to take you to the beach.
I wonder if whales are stronger than sharks.
Why are you two on my Crazy Cyclone, totally expecting a ride from me?!
I cannot fly on a broom, so...
Who do you think you are?!
Why do not you guys ride on someone else's broom?!
You have royalty like me offering to ride with you.
You should be thankful, you peasant.
Seriously, who do you think you are?!
He said he wanted to check something out and left earlier.
It is pretty unusual for him to actually do some work.
That is Mr. Yami for you!
The place where Asta and the others are headed is an oceanfront town called Raquey.
Raquey has very strong mana, causing it to be hot year-round.
This makes it a popular resort getaway for royalty, nobles, and Magic Knights.
Why did not you just use your spatial magic to get there, Finral?
I have never been to Raquey before.
I cannot use my spatial magic to go to places I have not been to before.
Now we have to fly over.
Seriously, I have seniority over you!
I am surprised you have never been there before, Finral.
I figured you were flirting with all the girls on the beach there.
It is always better to save the best things for last.
That is why I have not gone yet.
I am so excited to go to Raquey!
The guy who is always awkwardly exhaling steam is not here.
Then where is the real Gordon?!
Is not it time to leave soon?
We should be able to see it soon.
I have never seen it before!
But I still do not see any sign of it.
Is Raquey still pretty far away?
We have been looking at the ocean for quite some time now.
It is so huge, I could not even tell!
It is beyond my wildest dreams!
I wish I could show Yuno and the other runts this view, too.
And someday, I would love to bring Sister Lily here, too.
He would better not be remembering that k-k-kiss!
W-Wipe that smirk off your face!
I-I-It is not like I would ever kiss him or anything.
I am going to show off this swimsuit I bought yesterday in front of him!
D-Do not get the wrong idea!
I am just going to show him that I am way better than Rebecca.
But I want him to see me...
But this is still really embarrassing!
Wh-What do you think about this swimsuit?
How do you like my awesome swimwear?!
What the heck is that, Magna?!
This is something that Mr. Yami also uses!
Let us swim to our hearts' content in this ocean that is as big as Mr. Yami's heart, Asta!
What do you think of my swimsuit?
Does not it look great on me?
It is not that different from how you usually dress.
I guess a virgin delinquent like you cannot understand adult charm.
Who are you calling a virgin delinquent?!
Want To go for a run?
Man, you are on fire, Magna!
I made it look just like you.
Hey, Brother, show me the ocean!
It is so big and beautiful!
Next time, we can come here together and splash around!
I want to play with Asta in the ocean someday!
I am giving you permission to look at me in my swimsuit.
Anyone who tries to tempt my Marie shall die!
So, so many hot girls in swimsuits!
We will be twins, and our selling point can be our snappy dialogue!
This goes hand-in-hand with the beach.
If it is food, I know it like the back of my hand.
Nothing beats having drinks on the beach!
Charmy, you need to move more to the right!
Were not you helping Finral pick up some girls?
Yeah, but I got bored, so I left him behind.
A little more to the left!
I told you, to the right!
I thought I was a goner!
What are you doing, Miz Charmy?!
If you had hit anyone else, they would be dead!
You do not get it at all!
It only occurred to me after I turned into you, but your muscles are gross.
You should use your transformation spell for something more useful, Grey!
It is just like I thought!
Running on this sand is excellent training for my legs!
Look at me in my swimsuit, you idiot!
You still cannot control your magic?!
You saved my butt this time, but seriously!
All I can manage without a staff are defense spells that remain stationary.
Why are you bragging about that?!
So this is the famous Raquey Beach.
The ocean is calling my name!
Sekke, should we really be playing around?
Is not that all we really do?
Well, I did such a good job on that last mission...
that the Wizard King gave me a hundred stars!
And most importantly, I saved all the kids from those evildoers.
It would not hurt for me to spread my wings a bit.
Want to come play with me?
Look at that loser trying to pick up girls.
I cannot do something so vulgar.
I will meet up with you guys after you successfully pick up some girls.
He is planning to show up and act like he is doing us a favor!
The only reason you got to come here is because of me, the Magic Knight, right?
Guess we do not have a choice.
Look, there are some ideal babes right over there.
To come talk with us about how awesome magical girls are?
She is from the Black Bulls!
Did we just run something over?
I think we ran into something.
We came here to look for the magic stone!
Why are you all playing around?!
All right, gather round, you idiots.
I picked up some info while you were messing around.
Apparently the Underwater Temple really is at the bottom of the ocean.
But the mana kicks up the ocean currents so much that,
ordinarily, even a first-class mage cannot get near it.
But on the night of the full moon,
We might be able to get in then.
C-Captain Yami is actually, seriously doing his job!
I am seriously going to murder all of you.
Like the name suggests, the Underwater Temple is on the ocean floor.
We cannot just walk to it.
Take us there with your water magic.
B-But I would need incredible magic control in order to do that.
If you fail, the fierce currents will take us all under, and we will drown.
This is a top secret mission entrusted to only the Black Bulls.
No one else can do it.
The next full moon is a week away.
Learn to control it by then.
Right now, it is my only spell.
Developing it further should be the quickest way.
Vanessa taught me some magic control tricks before, but none of them have worked.
Maybe I just do not have the ability to control magic.
But even if I do not have talent, I will not run or make excuses!
I will just keep working... until I figure it out!
Ow, ow, ow, ow, ow, ow!
So you were training too, Asta?
A-As if a royal like me would train.
If you lose control again, I will be able to stop you.
Training with just the two of us...
W-Well, if you insist, I guess I would not mind...
How do I look in this swimsuit?
That would probably work great as part of a scarecrow.
You sort of look like a cow back in Hage...
But you told me to look!
Did you all enjoy yet another appearance by me, the great Sekke Bronzazza?
I am even more bah-hawesome on the beach!
Black Clover, Page 41: The Water Girl Grows Up.
Page 41 The Water Girl Grows Up
